snippet.title: Greyhill Incident - Found Footage Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
This Special "Found Footage Mode" adds the option to experience the Story of Greyhill through a very classic 90s Black and white Body Cam. 
It will be available on June 9th in the Digital & Physical Abdcuted Edition!
Wishlist Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1905020/Greyhill_Incident/

This is the ultimate upgrade for Greyhill Incident and can be switched on & off during the game whenever you want through the pause menu.
